title: Calories in a Tootsie Pop
meta_description: Discover calories in a Tootsie Pop, including carbs, sugars, full nutrition breakdown per pop, and simple tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard Tootsie Pop with chocolate center, approximately 17 g, fruit-flavored lollipop with Tootsie Roll core.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, size, and manufacturer; check packaging for exact values as recipes may change.

quick_answer.text: A single Tootsie Pop contains about 60 calories, mostly from sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Tootsie Pop?
faqs.a: About 60 calories per standard Tootsie Pop.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Tootsie Pop?
faqs.a: Approximately 15 g carbs, including 11 g sugars, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: Does a Tootsie Pop have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No significant protein (0 g) or fat (0 g); it's mostly sugar-based.

faqs.q: Are there calories in the Tootsie Roll center?
faqs.a: Yes, the center adds about 20 calories; the lollipop part is around 40.

faqs.q: How does flavor affect calories in a Tootsie Pop?
faqs.a: Flavors are similar, but nut or caramel variations may add 5-10 calories.
